StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetProgramCodeByNwaID]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body: ( @NwaID int ) AS SELECT PG.PROGRAM_CODE, PG.PROGRAM_TYPE, PA.PROGRAM_ASSIGNMENT_DATE, ISNULL(N.DUTY_PREFERENCE1, '00') AS DUTY_PREFERENCE1 FROM PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY PA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN NWA N ON PA.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID INNER JOIN PROGRAM PG ON PA.PROGRAM_ID = PG.PROGRAM_ID WHERE PA.NWA_ID = @NwaID
